body:
Since a few days we started experiencing errors on most of the unit tests job running on python 2.7. The jobs seem to hang when trying to concretize `mpileaks`:
```console
${coverage_run} bin/spack -p --lines 20 spec mpileaks
```

### Expected Result

Green light on Travis

### Actual Result

The job errors out after waiting 10 minutes without receiving any output. 

### Notes

- The error result does not happen consistently, but is indeed very frequent -  it usually takes several restarts to have a job that passes the concretization of `mpileaks`
- The error consistently happen only on python 2.7
- An example of a failing job is [here](https://travis-ci.org/spack/spack/jobs/353413242)
title: Frequent failures on python 2.7 unit tests
